item.description:
Mary Z. Connaughton, Jim McKenna, Bill Campbell, Gerry Dembrowski and Sandi Martinez are just some of the candidates that have been invited.

This should be a great night of food, drink and passionate political discussion. Great opportunity to energize and share ideas for the last 4 critical days before the election. All Tea Party members and friends are welcome.

The owners of Joe Sent ME @ 849 Main St in Waltham have graciously offered up their venue for this event - let's take advantage and pack the house.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Tea Party gathering.
item.name: Waltham Last Call Rally
